typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		dep_id as string,
		salary as string,
		mob as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		emp_id as string,
		emp_name as string,
		dep_id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@dep_id == source2@dep_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joined
